articles.description: ARLINGTON -- Astros left fielder Chas McCormick took a moment to look around the stands at Globe Life Field and soak in a sellout crowd, many of whom were clad in Houston orange. The roar of the crowd at key moments Friday night brought to mind a playoff atmo…
